Rs :-6,30,000/- House settlement deed valued at
2026,,, dated 09th January,,
signed by :- D. Rangadu's wife Dharmavaram Maddakka, aged 41 years, Out of my love for you, I have given you the property valued at Rs. 6,30,000/- in letters as a settlement without taking any reward from you, and I have taken possession of the said property this very day. Therefore, from now on, you and your heirs shall enjoy the said property in complete and uninterrupted enjoyment with full rights of donation. Therefore, from now on, you and your heirs shall have no right over the said property, but only your heirs and I and my heirs shall have no right whatsoever. According to the said schedule, the property is
IPIF 0033674698

Declaration
This declaration is to inform that in the course of preparing this document, I/We have brought all the necessary documents such as the details of the property, 1B/Adangal coffees of the land, the tax receipts related to the places and houses, the addresses of the parties in the link document, the photos of the parties, the details of the property, etc., and have examined all the aspects completely and have included them in this document and have got the document prepared. Therefore No matter which should have been written or included in this deed has been omitted. The deed has been drawn up after physically examining and measuring the property. The property in the said deed has not been sold or given to you in writing and has not been mortgaged (bank loans, etc.) to anyone else. I/We declare that this property is a freehold property and that there are no dues payable on the said property and that I/We will be able to pay the stamp duty due on the property in the said deed in the future. I/We have not violated the rules and regulations related to section 88-B of the Registration Act, 1908. I/We shall be fully responsible for all other matters. I/We shall be liable for any and all damages, losses, damages by:

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 179 of 2026 dated 09/Jan/2026, executed by Dharmavaram Rangadu in favour of his wife, Dharmavaram Maddakka, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 99 Sq.Yds, bearing house number 7/81, Old Assessment No.648 & New Assessment No.204350000384, comprised in survey number 161, situated in Koilakonda Village, Krishnagiri Mandal, erstwhile Kurnool District, now within the District of Nandyal, registered at Sub-Registrar Office, Dhone(1307) is bounded as follows: North by: Donor's Site South by: Road East by: Maddiletti house West by: Peddaiah House
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note:: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
